body:
Comment 7 by **qeed.quan**: 
if you guys dont want to debug, can you tell me how to start? i never debugged go on
windows so i dont know how it goes. right now when you run it justs says programs stops
working and thats it. It dumps a log but looking through it it doesnt say anything at
all useful. The log is the information that you send to microsoft when there is a crash
in an app.
